post.description: Create a new account. If creating an account for a business, authentication is required and the user must be the business owner.

get.description: Get all available system functions. Only business owners can access this.
Get account information for the currently authenticated user.

post.description: Create a new account role for a business.

get.description: Get an account role by ID. Only business owners can get roles.
get.summary: Get an account role by ID

put.description: Update an account role by ID. Only business owners can update roles.
put.summary: Update an account role by ID

delete.description: Delete an account role by ID. Only business owners can delete roles.
delete.summary: Delete an account role by ID

post.description: Assign a function to an account role. Only business owners can perform this action.
post.summary: Assign a function to an account role

get.description: Get accounts based on user's role. A business owner or employee sees all accounts for their business. An individual user sees only their own account.

delete.description: Delete an account. Only business owners can delete employee accounts.

post.description: Assign a role to an account. Only business owners can assign roles.
post.summary: Assign a role to an account

patch.description: Update the status of a role assigned to an account. Only business owners can perform this action.
patch.summary: Update the status of a role assigned to an account

get.description: Get all businesses where the current user is an owner
get.summary: Get all businesses for the current user

post.description: Create a business with the provided details

get.description: Get all roles for a business
get.summary: Get all roles for a business

post.description: Create a payment with the provided details
Create a price modifier with the provided details

get.description: Get price modifier information by id

BearerAuth.description: "Type 'Bearer' followed by a space and a JWT token."
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
